net.canarymod.hook.player

Class SlotClickHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.canarymod.hook.Hook
      • net.canarymod.hook.CancelableHook
        • net.canarymod.hook.player.SlotClickHook

  • public final class SlotClickHook
extends CancelableHook
    Slot click hook

    Called when a Player clicks a slot or outside a inventory window

    Author:
    Jason (darkdiplomat)

      • SlotClickHook

        public SlotClickHook(Player player,
                     Inventory inventory,
                     Item item,
                     SlotType slotType,
                     SecondarySlotType secondarySlotType,
                     GrabMode grabMode,
                     ButtonPress button,
                     short slotId,
                     short transNum)
        Constructs a new SlotClickHook
        Parameters:
        player - the Player clicking
        inventory - the Inventory thats open
        item - the Item in the slot clicked
        slotType - the SlotType being clicked
        secondarySlotType - the SecondarySlotType being clicked
        grabMode - the GrabMode of the link
        button - the ButtonPress
        slotId - the slot id
        transNum - the transaction number
